title: Pasquils fooles-cap sent to such (to keepe their weake braines warme) as are not able to conceiue aright of his mad-cap. With Pasquils passion for the worlds waywardnesse. Begun by himselfe, and finished by his friend Morphorius.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publicationStmtPublisher: [by R. Bradock] for Thomas Iohnes, dwelling neere Holborne Conduit,
